definition: good action, deed, thing or work (also sarcastic, "a fine thing indeed")/charity/happy occasion/Daoist or Buddhist ceremony for the souls of the dead
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
the road to happiness is strewn with setbacks (idiom)
lit. good deeds do not go beyond the door, evil deeds spread a thousand miles/a good deed goes unnoticed, but scandal spreads fast (idiom)
pinyin: hao3 shi4 bu4 chu1 men2 , e4 shi4 chuan2 qian1 li3
containing_words.word: 好事不出门，恶事传千里

sentences.english: Reading is good, but we have to choose what to read.
sentences.chinese: 读书是一好事，但我们必须多加注意书的选择。

sentences.english: The good he did will live after him.
sentences.chinese: 他生前做的好事将永留人世。

sentences.english: Did not have painful apprehension, thick nature is meddlesome .
sentences.chinese: 没有了痛的顾虑，粗自然是好事了。

sentences.english: This is a great good deed. The people involved can all benefit from it.
sentences.chinese: 这是件大好事，只要是参与的人都可以从中获益。

sentences.english: The good which he did will live after him.
sentences.chinese: 他生前做的好事将永留人世。

sentences.english: Zheng Jie emphasizes, it is meddlesome , should have done it.
sentences.chinese: 郑捷强调，是好事，就应该把它做好。

sentences.english: Hopefully you don't give us too much of a good thing.
sentences.chinese: 对于这样的好事，万分希望您别让我们好过头。

sentences.english: I just think it's good to have a lot of choices for the student body.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得，让学生们有更多可选择的食物是件好事。

sentences.english: So being rakish is a good thing.
sentences.chinese: 所以行为放荡还是一件好事。

sentences.english: Helping Africa is a good thing but, then, so is selling dog food.
sentences.chinese: 帮助非洲人是一件好事，但卖狗粮也是。

sentences.english: Too much of a good thing.
In general, this is even better news for developers.
sentences.chinese: 大体上，这对于开发者来说是件好事。

sentences.english: Have change, something good something bad.
sentences.chinese: 对我来说，也一样好事多过坏事。

sentences.english: It is a good thing that this park has excellent drainage.
sentences.chinese: 这个公园的排水系统很好是件好事。

sentences.english: As a result, the bad thing has been turned into a good one.
and that's a really good thing because she's so high profile.
sentences.chinese: 这真是一件好事，因为她有如此高的知名度。

definition: major event/major political event (war or change of regime)/major social event (wedding or funeral)/(do sth) in a big way/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1]
one's employment/business/matter that needs to be settled/(northern dialect) (of a person) demanding/trying/troublesome/erhua variant of 事[shi4]/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1]
(coll.) As a matter of fact, ... (used to introduce evidence for what one has just asserted)
a meat pie falls from the sky (idiom)/to have something fall into your lap
